Header: Piyal Nishanrha gives statement to CID
Content: Parliamentarian Piyal Nishantha arrived at the Criminal Investigations Department to record a statement. It was reported that the MP had allegedly mentioned in a public media that 11 security personnel were among the casualties in the explosion that happened in the Saintha-maruthu area in Ampara. He was accused of creating a social disaster by provoking the people.It was in this respect that he was summoned to the Criminal Investigations Department to record a statement.
